author: cnbc.com
title: Cytori reports 4Q loss
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Cytori Therapeutics Inc. (CYTX) on Thursday reported a loss of $8.3 million in its fourth quarter.
The San Diego-based company said it had a loss of 20 cents per share. Losses, adjusted for non-recurring costs, came to 10 cents per share.
The developer of cell therapies posted revenue of $1.5 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $22.7 million, or 82 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $2.7 million.
The company's shares closed at 32 cents. A year ago, they were trading at $1.55.
